trans-unit.source: Provides panels on each side of the form and a central panel that can hold one or more controls.
<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> is similar to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> è simile a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SplitContainer>.

trans-unit.source: It uses four docked side panels (instances of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>) and one central panel (an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>) to create a typical arrangement.
trans-unit.target: Utilizza quattro pannelli laterali ancorati (istanze di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>) e un pannello centrale (un'istanza di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>) per creare una disposizione tipica.

trans-unit.source: You cannot remove the side panels, but you can hide them by setting their respective <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.BottomToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.LeftToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.RightToolStripPanelVisible%2A> properties to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Non è possibile rimuovere i pannelli lato, ma è possibile nasconderle impostando le rispettive <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.BottomToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.LeftToolStripPanelVisible%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.RightToolStripPanelVisible%2A> proprietà `false`.

trans-unit.source: By default, each of these properties is `true` at design time.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, ognuna di queste proprietà è `true` in fase di progettazione.

trans-unit.source: Also at design time, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> appears with its top panel already expanded.
trans-unit.target: Anche in fase di progettazione di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> viene visualizzato con il pannello superiore già espanso.

trans-unit.source: You can neither remove nor hide the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Non è possibile rimuovere né nascondere il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.

trans-unit.source: You can arrange one or more <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls in the side panels, and you can use the central panel for other controls.
trans-unit.target: È possibile disporre di uno o più <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controlli nei pannelli laterali ed è possano utilizzare il pannello centrale per altri controlli.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel> also provides a way to get renderer support into the body of your form for a consistent appearance.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel> fornisce inoltre un modo per ottenere il supporto del renderer nel corpo del form per un aspetto coerenza.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> does not support Multiple Document Interface (MDI) applications.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> non supporta le applicazioni di interfaccia a documenti multipli (MDI).

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> for MDI applications.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel> per le applicazioni MDI.

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates adding a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> and a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to a Windows Forms, adding items to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, and adding the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanel%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Esempio di codice seguente viene illustrato come aggiungere un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> e un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> a un Windows Form, aggiunta di elementi di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>e l'aggiunta del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanel%2A> del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the bottom panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> representing the bottom panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> che rappresenta il pannello inferiore del <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.BottomToolStripPanel%2A> property to add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls or move them from another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.BottomToolStripPanel%2A> proprietà da aggiungere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controlla o spostarli da un altro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the bottom panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> is visible.
<see langword="true" /> if the bottom panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se il riquadro inferiore del <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> è visibile; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.BottomToolStripPanelVisible%2A> property to `false` to use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> without a bottom panel.
trans-unit.target: Impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.BottomToolStripPanelVisible%2A> proprietà `false` per utilizzare un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> senza pannello inferiore.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
<see langword="true" /> if the control causes validation; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se il controllo causa la convalida. in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: This property is not relevant for this class.
trans-unit.target: Questa proprietà non è pertinente per questa classe.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.CausesValidation" /> property changes.
For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [gestione e generazione di eventi](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: Gets the center panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel" /> representing the center panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel" /> che rappresenta il riquadro centrale del <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: You can use the top, bottom, left, and right panels of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> to hold <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare superiore, inferiore, sinistro e destro pannelli del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> per contenere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controlli.

trans-unit.source: Controls other than <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> are automatically added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.
trans-unit.target: I controlli diversi da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> vengono aggiunti automaticamente per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContentPanel>.

The ContextMenuStrip associated with this control.
trans-unit.target: ContextMenuStrip associato a questo controllo.

trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Size" /> che rappresenta le dimensioni orizzontali e verticali del <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />, in pixel.

trans-unit.source: Gets the left panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> representing the left panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> che rappresenta il pannello di sinistra di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.LeftToolStripPanel%2A> property to add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls or move them from another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.LeftToolStripPanel%2A> proprietà da aggiungere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controlla o spostarli da un altro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the left panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> is visible.
<see langword="true" /> if the left panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se il riquadro sinistro del <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> è visibile; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.LeftToolStripPanelVisible%2A> property to `false` to use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> without a left panel.
trans-unit.target: Impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.LeftToolStripPanelVisible%2A> proprietà `false` per utilizzare un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> senza pannello sinistro.

trans-unit.source: The event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeftChanged" /> event.
An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SizeChanged" /> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene generato un evento, il gestore dell'evento viene richiamato tramite un delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [gestione e generazione di eventi](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.OnSizeChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.OnSizeChanged%2A> consente inoltre alle classi derivate di gestire l'evento senza associare un delegato.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: È la tecnica consigliata per la gestione dell'evento in una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.OnSizeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.OnSizeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si esegue l'override di <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.OnSizeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> in una classe derivata, verificare di chiamare il metodo <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.OnSizeChanged(System.EventArgs)" /> della classe di base in modo che i delegati registrati ricevano l'evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the right panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.
A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> representing the right panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> che rappresenta il pannello di destra la <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.RightToolStripPanel%2A> property to add <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controls or move them from another <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.RightToolStripPanel%2A> proprietà da aggiungere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controlla o spostarli da un altro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the right panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> is visible.
<see langword="true" /> if the right panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se il riquadro destro del <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> è visibile; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.RightToolStripPanelVisible%2A> property to `false` to use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> without a right panel.
trans-unit.target: Impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.RightToolStripPanelVisible%2A> proprietà `false` per utilizzare un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> senza un riquadro di destra.

A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> representing the top panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel" /> che rappresenta il riquadro superiore del <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" />.

trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanel%2A> proprietà da aggiungere <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MenuStrip>, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip> controlla o spostarli da un altro <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripPanel>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the top panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> is visible.
<see langword="true" /> if the top panel of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> is visible; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se il riquadro superiore del <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer" /> è visibile; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanelVisible%2A> property to `false` to use a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> without a top panel.
trans-unit.target: Impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer.TopToolStripPanelVisible%2A> proprietà `false` per utilizzare un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripContainer> senza un riquadro superiore.
